Package ui

Class UserExperience

java.lang.Object
ui.UserExperience
public class UserExperience extends Object
The UserExperience class is used to manage and improve the user experience of a software application.

    • displayCell

      public void displayCell(String content)
      The function `displayCell` takes a string `content` and displays it inside a bordered cell with centered text.
      Parameters:
      content - The content parameter is a string that represents the content to be displayed in the cell. It can contain multiple lines separated by newline characters ("\n").

    • validateInput

      public String validateInput(String input)
      The function `validateInput` checks if a given input string is in the format "(number,number)" and if both numbers are non-negative.
      Parameters:
      input - The input parameter is a string that represents a pair of numbers separated by a comma.
      Returns:
      The method returns an error message as a String. If there are no validation errors, the method returns null.
